title: Shigeo Takahashi
text: was a Japanese <a href="Swimming%20%28sport%29">swimmer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Swimming%20at%20the%201932%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Men%27s%20100%20metre%20freestyle">men's 100 metre freestyle</a> at the <a href="1932%20Summer%20Olympics">1932 Summer Olympics</a> and the water polo tournament at the <a href="1936%20Summer%20Olympics">1936 Summer Olympics</a>.
